# Contributor.info

> A web application that analyzes GitHub repositories to provide insights about contributors, pull requests, and team dynamics. Users can sign in with GitHub, search any public repository, and discover contributor patterns, activity trends, and project health metrics.

This application helps repository maintainers, team leads, and open source contributors understand project collaboration patterns. Key insights include contributor distribution analysis, pull request activity monitoring, lottery factor assessment for project sustainability, and team velocity tracking.

The app provides real-time GitHub data visualization, contributor rankings and profiles, PR workflow analytics, and actionable recommendations for improving project health and contributor engagement.

## User Experience & Features

- [Lottery Factor Insights](docs/feature-lottery-factor.md): Understanding project sustainability and contributor distribution risk assessment
- [PR Activity Analytics](docs/insight-pr-activity.md): Real-time pull request monitoring, team velocity, and workflow health metrics
- [Distribution Charts](docs/feature-distribution-charts.md): Language distribution analysis and contribution pattern visualization across programming languages and contributor quadrants
- [Contributor of the Month](docs/feature-contributor-of-month.md): Monthly contributor recognition system with rankings, leaderboards, and achievement tracking
- [Repository Activity Feed](docs/feature-activity-feed.md): Real-time chronological stream of pull request activity, contributor interactions, and project developments
- [Contribution Analytics](docs/feature-contribution-analytics.md): Advanced contribution classification using quadrant analysis for impact and effort assessment
- [Repository Search & Tracking](docs/feature-repository-search.md): Comprehensive repository discovery, analysis, and monitoring capabilities with search and tracking features
- [Social Cards](docs/feature-social-cards.md): Automated generation of shareable visual summaries for social media and project promotion
- [Contributor Profiles](docs/feature-contributor-profiles.md): Detailed individual contributor analysis including expertise areas, work patterns, and impact metrics
- [Repository Health Dashboard](docs/feature-repository-health.md): Comprehensive project health assessment with sustainability metrics and actionable recommendations
- [Time Range Analysis](docs/feature-time-range-analysis.md): Flexible temporal analysis across 30, 60, and 90-day periods for trend identification and planning
- [Authentication & Protected Features](docs/feature-authentication.md): Secure GitHub OAuth integration with progressive enhancement and advanced analytics access
- [Quick Start Guide](README.md): How to use the application - sign in, search repositories, and explore insights

## Getting Started

- [Project Overview](README.md): Features overview, live application access, and basic usage instructions
- [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md): For developers who want to contribute to the project
